description: This file contains reusable React UI components such as Container, Section, Badge, Button, Input, Header, Footer, Hero, Carousel, ProductCard, FilterSidebar, Modal, CartDrawer, and Toast for an e-commerce frontend, specifically tailored to the Pastel Outfit marketplace.

methods.name: Container
methods.description: A layout component that wraps children in a centered container with max width and padding.

methods.name: Section
methods.description: A semantic section component with padding, used to segment parts of the UI.

methods.name: PastelBadge
methods.description: A styled span component used to display product tags or labels.

methods.name: Button
methods.description: A versatile styled button component supporting multiple variants and disabled state.

methods.name: Input
methods.description: A labeled input component with styling and focus styles.

methods.name: TextArea
methods.description: A labeled textarea component with styling.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: A site header component including logo and navigation links.

methods.name: Footer
methods.description: A site footer with copyright info.

methods.name: Hero
methods.description: A hero section with a gradient background, title, description, and call-to-action buttons.

methods.name: Carousel
methods.description: An auto-advancing image carousel with manual navigation controls.

methods.name: ProductCard
methods.description: A product display card showing image, name, price, tags, and an 'Add' button.

methods.name: FilterSidebar
methods.description: A filtering sidebar with search and tag filter buttons.

methods.name: Modal
methods.description: A modal dialog component with overlay and close button.

methods.name: CartDrawer
methods.description: A slide-out cart panel with overlay, close functionality, and children as cart contents.

methods.name: Toast
methods.description: A transient notification component that shows messages at the bottom of the screen.
